I've been single for a while now, but I'm looking forward to finding someone to share my life with.
i like to listen to country music.
I'm going to go shopping and test drive my new car.
I take a walk in the canyon before starting my work.
my car has to be as fast as my motorcycle.

since my dog died i am incomplete.
I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to.
i am in preschool.
I spend my day researching the paranormal with my new friend, who is always open to discussing my wild ideas.

content.text: Good, just got back from the city. I'm looking forward to a long walk in the canyon before starting work.
I'm going car shopping today! I'm looking for something fast and sleek.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I hope you find something great.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like to listen to country music. What about you?
I love country music too! I also like to listen to music from the 70s and 80s.
Those are great decades for music!
I know, right? I wish I could go back in time and see some of those concerts.
Me too! That would be so much fun.
I had a dog, but he died a few years ago. I miss him a lot.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I know how you feel. I lost my dog a few years ago too.
It's hard to lose a pet. They're like family.
They really are. I'm glad we have each other to talk to about it.
Me too. I'm glad I met you.
